home.aboutDescription: Madar is a research and advisory initiative exploring how digital design shapes institutional trust. We believe that in the age of digital governance, design is no longer downstream of policy — it is where policy becomes real.
home.eventsDescription: We convene leaders from government, technology, and design to explore how digital infrastructure can reflect institutional values at civilizational scale.
home.resourcesDescription: Research, white papers, and frameworks that define the emerging discipline of institutional design language.
home.insightsDescription: Perspectives on digital governance, design systems, and the future of state-citizen interaction.
home.principle1Desc: Government interfaces should project competence and care, not bureaucratic power.
home.principle2Desc: A system that is fast but unclear is not serving the citizen. Comprehension must precede speed.
home.principle3Desc: Digital services should welcome, guide, and reassure — as a host would treat a guest.
home.principle4Desc: Design must begin in Arabic and feel native, while remaining accessible to a global audience.

about.title: About Madar
about.subtitle: Shaping the digital design language of governance.
about.missionText: Madar exists to define and advance the emerging discipline of institutional design language — the deliberate, values-driven approach to how governments communicate through digital interfaces. We believe design is not an implementation detail; it is the place where governance is interpreted.
about.approachText: We operate at the intersection of policy, technology, and design. Through rigorous research, expert roundtables, and published frameworks, we help governments and institutions build digital experiences that reflect their values consistently across agencies, sectors, and citizen journeys.
about.focus1Desc: Treating design systems as critical public infrastructure, not aesthetic choices.
about.focus2Desc: Building digital experiences that cultivate and maintain institutional trust.
about.focus3Desc: Ensuring digital governance reflects the cultural context it serves.
about.focus4Desc: Placing the citizen journey at the center of all digital design decisions.
about.kingdomText: Saudi Arabia is undergoing deliberate, centrally articulated transformation while retaining deep sources of cultural and historical legitimacy. When transformation is intentional, design becomes a tool of direction, not correction. Madar helps ensure that this transformation is expressed consistently across every digital touchpoint.
